lines: 1. Abiro ni msalaba,an ayom, an ng`a modhier;Aweyo gi piny duto,Mond` akwo e msalaba.
An agenoi kende,Nyarombo mar Kalwari;Ruoth akulora ni In;Yesu Ruoth, mond` iwara.
2. Ayuakni koro, Jawar,Richo e moloyoa;Yesu to wacho niya,"Anawe gi duto te."
3. Achiwoni duto te,ngimana kod tekona;Chunya kod ringra bende,Nobed mari nyaka chieng`.
4. Kuom rembi manochwerna,aseluokora koro;Aweyo gombo duto,analuwi, Jawarna.
5. Yesu bi, ipong` chunya,mond` abed molony kuomi;Abedi maler chutho,mond` apaki nyaka chieng`.
